text: Anseongella ginsenosidimutans is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-spore- forming bacterium from the genus of Anseongella which has been isolated from soil from a ginseng field in Pocheon in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Anseongella ginsenosidimutans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Anseongella ginsenosidimutans
